title: Text boxes duplicating in certain websites
content: Using text boxes such as comment sections in certain sites will "duplicate" the boxes directly over it Scrolling up and down will lock the boxes on screen and leave multiple traces of the text boxes Refreshing the page will remove the boxes temporarily but will happen again Happens inconsistently on multiple websites Site shown under is dcinside.com
creator: unreal99123846

title: Most recent update has broken adding custom search.
content:
Debian 12 (Bookworm) Desktop Firefox 115.4.0esr (64-bit) & Firefox 119.0.1 flatpak (64-bit) add-ons: uBlock Origin (Version 1.53.0), Privacy Possum (Version 2019.7.18) , Add custom search engine (Version 4.2), Search Engines Helper by Soufiane Sakhi.

when using custom search add-ons after the most recent update none of the options I have tried work. As listed i have tried two with different search engines.
creator: Leonardtoy

title: Type in Hindi or Marathi with Typewriter / Godrej / Remington Layout
content: I find add ons that help to type in Hindi or Marathi with Phonetic Layout / Inscript Layout but do not find any add on that help us to type in Typewriter / Godrej / Remington layout which are largely used in India. Is there any add on available.
creator: aniruddha.mohod

title: Picture-in-Picture
content: For whatever reason the Picture-in-Picture button keeps not showing up in normal places like Prime, Netflix, Hulu, etc. I can make it come back by going to the Settings turning off the Picture-in-Picture option (Which is always still active) refreshing the settings then going back to Picture-in-Picture and turning it back on and then finally refreshing the video I was trying to use, but this is kind of a lot to have to do every time it happens and it seems to be happening more and more, so I'd like to fix the root cause instead if possible. Any ideas?
creator: maddieheth
